name: Pineapple + Smoked Jackfruit Pizza
instructions: 1. Cook spaghetti in boiling water until al dente. 2. In a separate pan, fry bacon until crisp. 3. Beat eggs and mix in grated Parmesan cheese. 4. Drain spaghetti and mix with bacon. 5. Pour egg and cheese mixture over spaghetti and toss until coated. 6. Serve immediately with a sprinkle of black pepper.

comments.comment: This recipe is amazing! The combination of flavors is perfect.
I tried this last night and it turned out great. Definitely making it again!
